pos review: Close to the train station and comfortable stay. Breakfast is great too!

Extremely helpful staff, despite my flight was delayed and would not make it for check in on time, they offered me an alternative and saved my trip. They had anything necesary for a comfortable stay and nice and varied common areas to relax and work.
neg review: The matress was the worst part, enough for a couple of nights, and only one working socked in the room to charge things, despite being for 6 people..

I forgot how things work in hostels (making my bed by myself, no toiletries or towels in the room, except for toilet paper), but that's my problem. I paid more for a private room than I would have in a 1-star hotel with all the usual service, but there was no choice at the time of booking.

pos review: It was near the train station. I recommend to those that love to talk and sher the roum ;)
neg review: The handkercheefs missing near the sink, also the soap was innexistent/missing. Also it was good a garbedge in the room not only in the bath ;)

pos review: Showed in the bedroom is really good.
neg review: The common area close after 23:00. No place to have a seat to do some leisure stuff. And the WiFi signal is only at the common area.  The signal at bedroom area is very weak.

pos review: Friendly staff. Beds are not jerky. Location is excellent.
neg review: No free parking in the Hostel
The showers are private, but you don't have a flow regulator
